alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laramie County through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ranchettes, or 7 miles east of Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Burns, Hillsdale and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 367 and 392. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County
